title: NodeInfo
description: Get info about the machine that you're deployed on. Tells CPU count, hostname, OS, and Uptime
name: nodeinfo

title: Figlet
description: Generate ASCII logos with the figlet CLI
name: figlet

title: Manifest Query
description: Based on the simple utility and backend for querying Docker v2 API-supporting registry images and reporting on "manifest list" multi-platform image support by Phil Estes
name: mquery
